Name: jaibatrik
AboutMe:
I am a software developer from the core of my heart. I like technologies that enable us to design new products which will make others' life more bearable, comfortable and happy. And everyone wants to be happy, isn't it?!

Some of the technologies I admire include Java, PHP (and loads of libraries based on that including Joomla, Wordpress and many ingenious technologies), the Android platform, awesome jQuery, OOP and MVC and many more.

There are some tools we have developed in the playful pursuit of gaining more knowledge. And yes, they are free.

EasyTodo - Smart Todo List for Android

Imagine Picture Viewer for Windows XP / Vista / 7 (32 bit)
